about_the_game:
Soft clicks of a metronome, a quiet but imperious voice and a cold, penetrating, it seems, to the very soul...
Opening her eyes, Christina found herself in a long-abandoned house, where, under white bedspreads and perennial layers of dust, she has to unravel the main secret of her life. The situation is complicated by the fact that it is impossible to get out of the house without going through all the labyrinths of rooms that are fraught with dangerous monsters. Solving riddles and making your way past monsters, there is a chance to find the cherished way out of the trap and find the key to your memories.

Forbidden Memories is a audio adventure game with a first-person view. The game has no graphics, you will only need to focus on character descriptions and hearing. The game has been specially designed for people with vision problems.

Key features
  • Binaural sound, immersing in the atmosphere of mysticism.
  • Full accessibility for people with vision problems
  • Puzzles to be solved with the help of hearing.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains scary sounds, as well as sounds of violence and obscene language.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: 64 bit processor with SSE2 support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Headphones and gamepad recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500 or AMD FX-8300
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible
  • DirectX: Version 10

short_description: Mystical audio quest in find objects style, accessable for the blind. By the fading sound of the metronome, Christina woke up in an abandoned house. Now her task is to get out of there.
